messages: b518d82bce0c71b66ccd76f2fb82cbe6 (20:49): hi all......need some help.....I have puppy linux 2.1 installed....and using it right now...with wireless
b518d82bce0c71b66ccd76f2fb82cbe6 (20:50): pcmcia card is Netgear wg511...Taiwan...that uses prism chipset
b518d82bce0c71b66ccd76f2fb82cbe6 (20:51): I have installed the firmware isl3890 to usr/lib/hotplug/firmware...and card works EXCEPT....usually I cannot download usign wget without the system freezing
b518d82bce0c71b66ccd76f2fb82cbe6 (20:51): any ideas what to look at etc.

b518d82bce0c71b66ccd76f2fb82cbe6 (20:52): Did have this card working flawlessly with a previous version of the puppy linux....and some commands someone had me enter...but stupid me forgot to write them down....hoping someone can help
b518d82bce0c71b66ccd76f2fb82cbe6 (20:53): even just help in troubleshooting....
b518d82bce0c71b66ccd76f2fb82cbe6 (21:06): anyone?

c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:06): hi all, i have some problems with spoofing a mac address
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:06): i use the program SirMACsAlot
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:07): so i'm conntected to a AP with standard mac
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:07): i run the programm SirMACsAlot
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:07): and change the MAC
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:07): if i check ifconfig ath0 i see that it changed
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:08): but i cant get a connection running to the AP with the new MAC, and no it has no MAC filter
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:08): can somebody help me?
f3dddede7cafdc2312155376d854dfa0 (22:09): niruana: try macchanger and if that fails, try #madwifi
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:10): i have the madwifi drivers Zero_Chaos
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:10): is it included ?
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:11): do they have a programm to spoof a mac?
f3dddede7cafdc2312155376d854dfa0 (22:11): niruana: use the program macchanger, if that fails, ask in #madwifi
c7eb660e48b4dbb4488831bc381ad825 (22:15): Is there any way to extend the range of this? http://www.parallax.com/detail.asp?product_id=28140
c7eb660e48b4dbb4488831bc381ad825 (22:15): An amp or something?
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (22:23): not really
05346ab3db400d0ed757154ddb3f0800 (22:24): delfino: an amp would probably not help much unless the rx sensitivity is junk
05346ab3db400d0ed757154ddb3f0800 (22:24): not to mention, goo dluck finding on
05346ab3db400d0ed757154ddb3f0800 (22:24): *good luck finding one
05346ab3db400d0ed757154ddb3f0800 (22:25): directional antenna would be much better, but large
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:26): how do i shutdown a device?
c7eb660e48b4dbb4488831bc381ad825 (22:27): DrDT: How would I attach a directional antenna to the module?
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:27): k got it i think wlanconfig ath0 destroy
c7eb660e48b4dbb4488831bc381ad825 (22:28): oh noes don't kill it permanently niruana

c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:47): Zero_Chaos: how can i stop resources from using my wificard? So i can run the macchanger, i get this error right now: ERROR: Can't change MAC: interface up or not permission: Device or resource busy
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:47): I'm using that device right now for internet
f3dddede7cafdc2312155376d854dfa0 (22:48): niruana: you must "ifconfig ath0 down" otherwise you cannot change mac
f3dddede7cafdc2312155376d854dfa0 (22:48): niruana: you will lose your connection
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:50): ok Zero_Chaos
c7eb660e48b4dbb4488831bc381ad825 (22:56): Is there any way to extend the range of this? http://www.parallax.com/detail.asp?product_id=28140 So I can pick up tags from 10+ feet away at 125kHz?
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (22:59): Zero_Chaos: sorry but how do i put it online again? :)
f3dddede7cafdc2312155376d854dfa0 (23:00): niruana: ?
f3dddede7cafdc2312155376d854dfa0 (23:00): ifconfig ath0 up
f3dddede7cafdc2312155376d854dfa0 (23:00): dhcpcd ath0
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (23:00): that last one i didnt know
c1b65a85dbb85ce58b49322a6a234513 (23:00): other things i should know?
f3dddede7cafdc2312155376d854dfa0 (23:00): man iwconfig
f3dddede7cafdc2312155376d854dfa0 (23:00): it is important
